column4: QUESTION: how to change information in the MENU/SYSTEM/ABOUT UBUNTU??????????   HeLp!!
ok, but how to change "about ubuntu" in "about luchix" (for example????
there's got to be an xml file somewhere that defines it.
I know, I know ... which one?!?
but how i can change menu entry.....????
maybe with source code o menubar??
np.  you're english is certainly good enough for me to understand :)
ubottu was told to tell you where to find italian channels by someone :)
sorry - I can't seem to find anything more on it.  I've got to sign of for now anyway.  Best of luck with your customization !

geirha help me!! :)  "luchix: ... not sure I understand what you mean, but you'll find that menu-entry as /usr/share/applications/ubuntu-about.desktop   You can open that file in a regular editor and change it."
